Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Class AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory

java.lang.Object
io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory
Enclosing class:
AdvancementProviderBase
public class AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory extends Object
An advancement factory can be used to customise an advancement in a builder style pattern. Calling one of the parent methods for the root advancement will cause an error. If this provider has no root advancement, you must always call one of the parent methods.

    • parent

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory parent(net.minecraft.advancements.Advancement parent)
      Sets the parent of this advancement.

    • parent

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory parent(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id)
      Sets the parent of this advancement. The advancement must be found in this provider.

    • parent

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory parent(String id)
      Sets the parent of this advancement. The advancement must be found in this provider. The string given here should be the same string as given to AdvancementProviderBase.advancement(String)

    • display

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory display(net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike icon)
      Sets the display info for this advancement. If display is not called, the advancement won't be visible.

    • background

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory background(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation background)
      Sets the background of the advancement tab. Must be used on the root advancement as is not allowed on others.

    • task

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory task(net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance... criteria)
      Adds a task to the advancement. A task can consist of multiple criteria. In this case one of the criteria must be completed to complete the whole task.

    • tasks

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory tasks(net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance... criteria)
      Adds multiple tasks to the advancement. Here all criteria must be completed to complete the advancement.

    • tasks

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory tasks(AdvancementProviderBase.TaskFactory factory)
      Adds multiple tasks to this advancement defined by the given AdvancementProviderBase.TaskFactory.

    • reward

      public AdvancementProviderBase.AdvancementFactory reward(net.minecraft.advancements.AdvancementRewards reward)
      Sets the reward for this advancement.
